name: Robmun
description:
Robmun is a runner where zombies are running from (invisible) mobs. It is a simple runner with a twist, you need to adjust the strength of the jumps before the jump. Press space to charge the jump and release to jump. Avoid boxes and try to avoid bushes.

As of now everything works. There are slight problems with physics but nothing really bad.

Soon I will be uploading binaries for different platforms.

Development URL: https://bitbucket.org/darkgazeorg/robmun/overview

You will need to build and install Gorgon v4 pre-alpha: https://bitbucket.org/darkgazeorg/gorgon-game-engine/branch/4.x-dev
